tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: This visual check helps you mentally connect the dots of what you see on a simulation with the definitions you produce!

paragraphs.text: Take a few more minutes to explore the trigger off event of the strategy, as well as the rest of the triggers ocurring over the period tested.
Take a moment to internalize the fact that events are triggered only once all the conditions in a given situation are met, and that conditions are evaluated over closed candles only!
